education.description: A Bachelor of Commerce specializing in Economics is a degree program focused on the study of economic principles within the context of business. It covers topics such as microeconomics, macroeconomics, and econometrics, preparing graduates for careers in finance, consulting, government, and research.

favouriteSubjects.name: Agile Rapid Skill Acquisition
favouriteSubjects.description: A fast, adaptable approach to learning, utilizing agile principles for quick skill acquisition through practical application and continuous improvement.

favouriteSubjects.name: Full Stack Web Development
favouriteSubjects.description: Involves building both the front-end and back-end of web applications. Developers proficient in full stack development are skilled in both client-side and server-side technologies, enabling them to create fully functional and dynamic websites or web applications.

favouriteSubjects.name: Engeneering Business System for 4IR
favouriteSubjects.description: Integrating engineering and Fourth Industrial Revolution technologies to optimize business processes.
